creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: white paper printed in black; rectangular image of linear silhouette of Santa Claus in sky behind a cottage in a snowy landscape with three very tall trees; graphic design of two radiating stars with snow; two banners with text above and below Santa Claus image: "Christmas Greetings...from the Holzschuhs"; sheet folded in half, but not folded into quaters creating greeting card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Christmas card with linear silhouette of Santa Claus and cottage
